thread.title: Irene & John Waller
thread.title_full: France Off the Beaten Path reviewed by Irene & John Waller

author: Irene & John Waller
title: Irene & John Waller
text: My husband and I have gone on several tours. My favorite has been with France Off the Beaten Path. The other tour groups were a size of Thirty people with just one guide. Off the Beaten Path had 2 tour guides for 17 people. I loved working out of one hotel, no luggage to worry about. My favorite day was was the day we did the cooking class with the French chef. Definitely would like to do another tour with this group
